Metadata.Title: Log Entries Include User Identification
Metadata.Author: Serge Batchilo, Jason Taylor, Joe Basirico

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 10.3.1

What to Check For

Log entries should include user identification.

How to Check

Examine the logs to verify that the entries include user identification information.

How to Fix

Please refer to the vendor's documentation or technical support for instructions on how to change the log output settings.
